duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct clinical reviews of medical data to perform prior authorization for specialty medications.
Apply clinical knowledge to plan approved criteria for prospective and concurrent reviews of cases.
Work from client supported systems and take inbound calls from physician or members regarding their pending, approved, or denied prior authorizations.
Review and complete criteria based prior authorization as per policy and procedure.
Provide internal pharmacist support to the prior authorization team and member services department.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Pharmacy or Pharm D. Must have an active license in the state of residence that is in good standing.
